history: some modern routers are still affected by these vulnerabilities… trust me… if you have a WPS PIN you can crack whatever password of whatever router, you have to get only the wps pin except for router that only uses button for WPS. How can I say this? Read this example: my neighbor didn’t have wifi t…

I thought the same as pry0cc, but I realized that if you travel to other countries like some in latin america they still use routers with more than 10 years so this is totally plausible, but the reality is that this type of attack is obsolete in face the new routers.
